description: This script sets up multiple Groq agents with specific tools and configurations, and creates a playground for these agents, including serving a FastAPI app.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific tools, instructions, and configurations.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Creates a playground environment for multiple agents and provides a web app.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: YouTubeTools
classes.description: Tools for interacting with YouTube videos.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the FastAPI application for the playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Runs the FastAPI app with optional reload.
